alert.note: Alert for Labette; Montgomery; Neosho; Wilson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 2:48PM CDT until August 25 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wilson County in southeastern Kansas... Northern Labette County in southeastern Kansas... Southwestern Neosho County in southeastern Kansas... Northeastern Montgomery County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 248 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Cherryvale, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Parsons, Cherryvale, Oswego, Altamont, Mound Valley, Labette, Parsons Tri City Airport, Lake Parsons, Dennis, and Big Hill Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
